desc.cn: kapp 是一个简单的部署工具，专注于“Kubernetes 应用程序”的概念——一组具有相同标签的资源
desc.en: kapp is a simple deployment tool focused on the concept of "Kubernetes application" — a set of resources with the same label

/curl.cmd:
mkdir local-bin/ \
&& curl -L https://carvel.dev/install.sh | K14SIO_INSTALL_BIN_DIR=local-bin bash \
&& export PATH=$PWD/local-bin/:$PATH

/wget.cmd:
wget -O- https://carvel.dev/install.sh > install.sh \
&&  sudo bash install.sh

darwin/brew.cmd:
brew tap carvel-dev/carvel \
&& brew install kapp
